resources.string: Browse through a database of over a million recipes and cook something new daily.
Got leftovers from last night? No problem.
Search recipes based on the leftovers from last meal and Say No To Food Waste.
Search a database of over a million recipes with just a few clicks.

JUST ET IT! is a simple app to browse and search through a database of over a million of recipes. It provides you a clean, simple and intuitive user interface. Apart from search and browsing, you can also search for recipes using the leftovers from your last meal as well.
Just click on the search icon on the right side of the toolbar, enter the recipe to search and hit the arrow in the soft keyboard.

In this section you can search recipes based on whatever things are left from you last meal or whatever ingredients you have. Enter the leftovers or the ingredients separated by comma , eg : egg,onion,cheese. And hit the search icon in the soft keyboard.
